title: Forcepoint Secure Web Gateway - Web Logs
description: This dashboard provides information about the web logs (swgweb) generated by Forcepoint SWG.

definition.content:
**Dashboard Overview**

The Forcepoint Secure Web Gateway - Web Logs dashboard provides overall insights of the web logs generated by Forcepoint SWG.


For more information, see the [Forcepoint Secure Web 
Gateway Integration documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/forcepoint_secure_web_gateway/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
